name: Ducktective: The case of the poisoned pond
name_original: Ducktective: The case of the poisoned pond
description:
Ducktective: The case of the poisoned pond is an adventure game developed by Spleep. It came out on 05-03-2023.
You can play Ducktective: The case of the poisoned pond on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
